animate.description: Whether the icon should be animated. Defaults to false.

aria-label.description: Input that can be used to specify the aria-label attribute.

backgroundType.description: Wether the icon has a background. If not set it will display just the icon without background. Possible values are circle and square.

color.description: The color of the icon represented as a color name contained in backbase-theme.

cropped.description: Whether the icon should be cropped horizontally.

flipOnRtl.description: Whether the icon should be flipped when the page direction is RTL (right-to-left).

inverse.description: Whether to use white background and inverse icon colors

size.description: The size of the icon represented as a size name contained in backbase-theme.  This is ignored when the circle option is used. Defaults to md.
